name: Spider Attacks
description:
A Wave Of Spiders Are Threating City of Hell-An, So The City Have Placed Agents to Defend The Streets Armed With Full Explosive Bullets That Can Destroy Everything

Your Objective As The Spiders Leader Is To Unite As Many Spiders Into Your Side To Attack The Agents And Destroy Their City, You Are Stronger Tougher 

You Will Only Win When All Houses Are Destroyed

R.......For Restart

T.......To Exit

Escape.......To Pause
